alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Henrico; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 8:34PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chesterfield and southern Henrico Counties and the City of Richmond through 915 PM EDT... At 833 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bon Air, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Downtown Richmond and Virginia Commonwealth University around 845 PM EDT. Bensley around 855 PM EDT. Bellwood around 900 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Richmond International, Fair Oaks, Richmond Heights, Varina, Drewrys Bluff, Montrose and Sandston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Henrico; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
